prefs.label: Enable Private Browsing
prefs.help: Determines whether the Private Browsing option should be in the app menu.

prefs.label: View Source
prefs.help: Determines whether the View Source option should be in the app menu.

prefs.label: Landscape Gesture Scroll
prefs.help: Determines whether the landscape gesture scroll should be enabled. If off, maps back and forward swipes in landscape to webpage history.

prefs.label: Fullscreen
prefs.help: Determines whether the browser should display in fullscreen.

prefs.label: Hide Icons After Load
prefs.help: Determines whether the bottom icons should be visible after the page finishes loading. The menu will reappear during Flash content.
